text: The 2019 GT4 South European Series was the first season of the GT4 South European Series, a sports car championship created and organised by Iberian- based promoter Race Ready and supported by the Stéphane Ratel Organisation (SRO). The season began on 20 April in Nogaro and ended on 24 November at Circuito do Estoril. ==Calendar== The competition will consist in 5 weekends with 2 races each, and a non championship race, the Vila Real International Cup. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Round ! Circuit ! Date ! Entries were required to complete 75% of the winning car's race distance in order to be classified and earn points. Individual drivers were required to participate for a minimum of 25 minutes in order to earn championship points in any race. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center;" !
